link.title: PSB Extended Learning
link.script:

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/2RnclfpmNe2awryiUuOhu1ztk-36m2BbnNFIhojnxZFk6rKk3FJDH_QVQmddmxXL0mMS0f-q=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: April 7 Update: The Brookline School Committee has voted to reclaim the April vacation period for instruction. Therefore, April vacation is canceled and remote learning will continue between Tuesday, April 21 and Friday, April 24, 2020. Learn more.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Based on the revised DESE guidelines published on March 30, PSB has provided revised guidelines for remote learning to all families and staff. It is expected that all grades should provide at least a half a day of a combination of teacher-directed and student self-directed learning opportunities which, for PSB, is three hours daily.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: includes lessons and learning structured and provided by the teacher either through instructions, assignments, resources, materials, recorded lessons, screencasts, videos, video conferencing, etc.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Student self-directed work includes working on choices or learning opportunities suggested by a teacher or team; students pursuing topics; reading books, doing projects that are of interest to them; longer term assignments or projects; and more;

div.p: While our approach to Remote Learning is not intended to replicate the traditional learning environment, the number of hours in a school day, or the regular curriculum, it is expected that new learning will occur during this closure. As such, we have shared recommendations to staff to provide students and families consistent structure, feedback, and communication during this time.

a.strong: The revised guidelines can be accessed here in its entirety.
